# Publication Configuration Class BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_source=Page source* ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_source_hint=The top page of the tree to be published, usually the top page of the book/library. (Mandatory) BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_destinationSpace=Page de destination* BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_destinationSpace_hint=L'espace dans lequel le contenu sera publi√© (obligatoire) BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_version=Version* BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_version_hint=La version √† publier (obligatoire) ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_variant=Variant ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_variant_hint=The variant to publish. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_language=Langue BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_language_hint=La langue √† publier BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishOnlyComplete=Ne publier que les pages "Termin√©es" ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishOnlyComplete_hint=Publish only the pages with the status "Complete". If unchecked, all statuses are published. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishPageOrder=Ordre de publication des pages ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishPageOrder_hint=Publish the page order from the source, which might overwrite the target ordering. If unchecked, the target ordering is left untouched. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour=Comportement de la publication BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour_hint=Which behaviour to adopt when the target space is already populated. "Cancel" for not publishing ; "Update" to publish update existing pages, add new pages from source but leave page deleted from source in the destination. Pages marked as deleted in source will be removed from destination. ; "Re-publish" to reset the destination space. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour_cancel=Annuler BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour_update=Mettre √† jour BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour_republish=Re-publier BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_title=Titre de destination ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_title_hint=The title which will be set on the destination root page. If empty, the title of the source page will be used. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_description=Description BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_description_hint=Description de la configuration ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.sourceLocationLabel=Location ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.sourceLocationHint=Location in the page hierarchy which will be the source of the publication ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationSpaceLabel=Name of the space ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationSpaceHint=(optional) If you want to create a new space with the specified name. ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationLocationLabel=Destination ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationLocationHint=Location in the page hierarchy which will be the destination of the publication ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationWikiLabel=Wiki name ### Missing: BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationWikiHint=Name of the wiki for the publication destination
